recommendations.title: Artificial Intelligence
recommendations.justification: This course covers AI concepts, machine learning, neural networks, and expert systems, providing a technical foundation for AI ethics and responsible technology. It combines technical skills with theoretical foundations and practical applications.

recommendations.title: Machine Learning
recommendations.justification: Machine learning algorithms, neural networks, and deep learning applications are essential for understanding AI ethics and responsible technology. This course offers a deep dive into supervised and unsupervised learning.

recommendations.title: Advanced Algorithms
recommendations.justification: Understanding advanced algorithmic techniques like dynamic programming and computational complexity theory is crucial for AI ethics and responsible technology. This course provides a strong foundation in algorithm design.

recommendations.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
recommendations.justification: Data Structures and Algorithms is a core requirement that builds on foundational concepts from CS101 and is essential for software engineering (CS306). It will provide you with the necessary skills for large-scale project management.

recommendations.title: Computer Networks
recommendations.justification: Computer Networks is a major elective that complements your software engineering knowledge from CS306. Understanding network protocols and security is crucial for modern software development.

recommendations.title: Web Development
recommendations.justification: Full-stack web development course with modern frameworks like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and database integration. Practical skills for job readiness.

recommendations.title: Software Engineering
recommendations.justification: Software development lifecycle methodologies, design patterns, testing strategies, version control systems, agile development, and project management. Valuable skills for tech industry transition.

recommendations.title: Advanced Algorithms
recommendations.justification: This course covers advanced algorithmic techniques essential for AI research and graduate-level work. Topics include dynamic programming, graph algorithms, and computational complexity theory.

recommendations.title: Artificial Intelligence
recommendations.justification: AI concepts covered in this course such as search algorithms, neural networks, and expert systems are crucial for theoretical understanding and research in AI. Practical applications are also explored.

recommendations.title: Web Development
recommendations.justification: This course focuses on full-stack web development with hands-on projects using modern frameworks like React and Node.js. It includes practical exercises and group work, making it ideal for visual and practical learners.
